channel.title: CVE Feed for Lauri Karisola / WP Trio -- Conditional Shipping for WooCommerce
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Lauri Karisola / WP Trio -- Conditional Shipping for WooCommerce

item.title: CVE-2022-46805|2024-08-03T14:39:38.711Z -- lauri%20karisola%20%2F%20wp%20trio -- conditional%20shipping%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Lauri Karisola / WP Trio Conditional Shipping for WooCommerce plugin <= 2.3.1 leading to activation/deactivation of plugin rulesets.
